hanzi-su-wiki:
朋

Значения

Друг, товарищ, спутник

Мнемоника

Первым спутником, который создал Бог, была Ева. Увидев её, Адам воскликнул: «Плоть 月 от плоти 月!»

Произношение и тон

péng
📢 Питер Пэн – мой друг.
♫ Питер Пэн умеет летать (восходящий 2-й тон).

heisig_chinese_memo: My companion and I are like two moons side by side
heisig_constituent: companion, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, moon2, month2, flesh2, part of the body2
heisig_story: The first companion that God made, as the Bible story goes, was Eve. Upon seeing her, Adam exclaimed, "Flesh of my flesh!" And that is precisely what this character says in so many strokes.
koohiiStory1: My companion and I are like two moons side by side.
koohiiStory2: Under the twin moons of Tatooine, Luke had no COMPANION.
Ru_trainchinese: péng: (графема) компаньон, друг; (книжн.) собираться в группу; (книжн.) соперничать, равняться
Kanshudo_mnemonic: after two months (月) you'd become friends
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: My companion and I are like two moons side by side
origin_of_ch_char_book: The ancient Chinese used seashells not just for currency, but also to wear around the neck as an ornament. (朋, peng=p’eng, friend) shows two lines of seashells. People used to carry seashells strung together like these because they were esier to carry that way. The appearance of two lines side by side seem like friends, leading this word to mean “friend”.
humanum_full_description_en:
Two strings of shellfish tied with ropes on a golden inscription elephant. The Yin and Shang Dynasty took jade and shellfish as their currency, and used things to run through them. The second-line jade is a "玨", and the second-line shell is a " friend ". (Wang Guowei) The unit of measurement used in Jia Jinwen. Such as "Collection" 29694: "Bei Shipeng." He Zun: "Yi (given) Bei 30peng." Qiu Weiyan: "Eighty friends."

Guo Moruo believes that the ancients first used shells as necklaces, and later evolved into currency. Therefore, Pombe may have no definite number, because the ancients used Pombe as a neck ornament at the beginning, and the length can be as long as it is suitable. Can prepare a word.

The Jiajin inscriptions also have the form of " Peng " and " Ren ", and scholars often refer to it as "倗". Next to the " person " is written "勹" in the bronze inscription, as if leaning over a human form. This glyph is used in bronze inscriptions to express the meaning of friend. The character " Peng " in regular script evolved from this glyph. (Huang Wenjie) See "倗".

Xu Shen believes that " Peng " is an ancient prose of " Feng ". "Said Wen": "𢐴, ancient phoenix, pictogram. The phoenix flies, the birds count in tens of thousands, so I think it is the word " Peng "." Pressing " Peng " and " Phoenix " is just a phony relationship.

There are also examples in ancient books where " Peng " means the unit of goods, such as "Poems. Xiaoya. "Jingjingzhe": "Since I have seen a gentleman, I have a hundred friends." "Huainanzi. "Tao Ying": "So Sanyisheng is to seek the treasures of the world with thousands of dollars, to obtain the treasures, the multiplication of the chickens, the profound jade, the big shells, the black leopard, the yellow 罴, the green 犴, and the white tiger text. To dedicate to Zhou."

" Peng " mostly means friends and like-minded people. Such as "Tsinghua One. "Cheng Mao" Jane 4: "Ke (He) respects (police) non-friends, Ke (He) refrains from non-commercials." It means to use friends as police and the Shang dynasty as a warning. Another example is "The Analects. "Xue Er": "Is it a pleasure to have friends from afar?"

" Peng " also means being in a group or party. Such as "Shan Hai Jing. "Bei Shan Jing": "There are birds Yan, who live in groups and fly with friends, and their hair is like a female pheasant, and the name is 鵁." "Chu Ci. "Li Sao": "While living at the same time and good friends, the husband He Yan will not listen."

" Peng " also means to share together. Such as "Hou Han Shu. "Li Du Biography": "Lee and Du are in the same position as friends." Li Xian's note: "Friends are the same."
humanum_short_description_en: Two strings of shellfish tied with rope on a golden inscription elephant. The Yin and Shang Dynasty took jade and shellfish as their currency, and used things to run through them. The second-line jade is a "玨", and the second-line shell is a " friend ". (Wang Guowei)
humanum_full_description:
甲金文象以繩綁繫兩串貝。殷商以玉、貝為貨幣，並以物貫串。二繫玉為一「玨」，二繫貝為一「朋」。（王國維）甲金文中用作貨貝的計量單位。如《合集》29694：「貝十朋。」何尊：「易（賜）貝卅朋。」裘衛盉：「八十朋。」

　　郭沫若認為古人最初用貝殼為頸飾，後來才演化為貨幣。故朋貝可能本無定數，因為古人起初以朋貝為頸飾，長短各隨所宜，成為貨幣後始有定數。可備一說。

　　甲金文另有從「朋」從「人」的字形，學者多隸定為「倗」。「人」旁在金文中或寫作「勹」，象俯身人形。這種字形在金文中用來表示朋友義。楷書的「朋」字就是從這種字形演變而來。（黃文傑）參見「倗」。

　　許慎認為「朋」是「鳳」的古文。《說文》：「𢐴，古文鳳，象形。鳳飛，群鳥從以萬數，故以爲朋黨字。」按「朋」、「鳳」只是音近假借的關係。

　　古書中也有「朋」表示貨貝單位的例子，如《詩．小雅．菁菁者莪》：「既見君子，錫我百朋。」《淮南子．道應》：「於是散宜生乃以千金求天下之珍怪，得騶虞、雞斯之乘，玄玉百工，大貝百朋，玄豹、黃羆、青犴，白虎文皮千合，以獻於紂。」

　　「朋」多表示朋友、志同道合的人。如《清華壹．程寤》簡4：「可（何）敬（警）非朋，可（何）戒非商。」意謂以朋友為警，以商朝為戒。又如《論語．學而》：「有朋自遠方來，不亦樂乎？」

　　「朋」也表示成群、結黨。如《山海經．北山經》：「有鳥焉，群居而朋飛，其毛如雌雉，名曰鵁。」《楚辭．離騷》：「世並舉而好朋兮，夫何焭獨而不予聽。」

　　「朋」還表示同共。如《後漢書．李杜列傳》：「李、杜司職，朋心合力。」李賢注：「朋，猶同也。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文象以繩綁繫兩串貝。殷商以玉、貝為貨幣，並以物貫串。二繫玉為一「玨」，二繫貝為一「朋」。（王國維）

甲金文象以繩綁繫兩串貝。殷商以玉、貝為貨幣，並以物貫串。二繫玉為一「 玨 」，二繫貝為一「 朋 」。（王國維）甲金文中用作貨貝的計量單位。如《合集》29694：「貝十朋。」何尊：「易（賜）貝卅朋。」裘衛盉：「八十朋。」 郭沫若認為古人最初用貝殼為頸飾，後來才演化為貨幣。故朋貝可能本無定數，因為古人起初以朋貝為頸飾，長短各隨所宜，成為貨幣後始有定數。可備一說。 甲金文另有從「 朋 」從「 人 」的字形，學者多隸定為「 倗 」。「 人 」旁在金文中或寫作「 勹 」，象俯身人形。這種字形在金文中用來表示朋友義。楷書的「 朋 」字就是從這種字形演變而來。（黃文傑）參見「 倗 」。 許慎認為「 朋 」是「 鳳 」的古文。《說文》：「𢐴，古文鳳，象形。鳳飛，群鳥從以萬數，故以爲朋黨字。」按「 朋 」、「 鳳 」只是音近假借的關係。 古書中也有「 朋 」表示貨貝單位的例子，如《詩．小雅．菁菁者莪》：「既見君子，錫我百朋。」《淮南子．道應》：「於是散宜生乃以千金求天下之珍怪，得騶虞、雞斯之乘，玄玉百工，大貝百朋，玄豹、黃羆、青犴，白虎文皮千合，以獻於紂。」 「 朋 」多表示朋友、志同道合的人。如《清華壹．程寤》簡4：「可（何）敬（警）非朋，可（何）戒非商。」意謂以朋友為警，以商朝為戒。又如《論語．學而》：「有朋自遠方來，不亦樂乎？」 「 朋 」也表示成群、結黨。如《山海經．北山經》：「有鳥焉，群居而朋飛，其毛如雌雉，名曰鵁。」《楚辭．離騷》：「世並舉而好朋兮，夫何焭獨而不予聽。」 「 朋 」還表示同共。如《後漢書．李杜列傳》：「李、杜司職，朋心合力。」李賢注：「朋，猶同也。」
Two strings of shellfish tied with ropes on a golden inscription elephant. The Yin and Shang Dynasty took jade and shellfish as their currency, and used things to run through them. The second-line jade is a " 玨", and the second-line shell is a " friend". (Wang Guowei) The unit of measurement used in Jia Jinwen. Such as "Collection" 29694: "Bei Shipeng." He Zun: "Yi (given) Bei 30peng." Qiu Weiyan: "Eighty friends." Guo Moruo believes that the ancients first used shells as necklaces, and later evolved into currency. Therefore, Pombe may have no definite number, because the ancients used Pombe as a neck ornament at the beginning, and the length can be as long as it is suitable. Can prepare a word. The Jiajin inscriptions also have the form of " Peng" and " Ren", and scholars often refer to it as " 倗". Next to the " person" is written " 勹" in the bronze inscription, as if leaning over a human form. This glyph is used in bronze inscriptions to express the meaning of friend. The character " Peng" in regular script evolved from this glyph. (Huang Wenjie) See " 倗". Xu Shen believes that " Peng" is an ancient prose of " Feng". "Said Wen": "𢐴, ancient phoenix, pictogram. The phoenix flies, the birds count in tens of thousands, so I think it is the word " Peng"." Pressing " Peng" and " Phoenix" is just a phony relationship. There are also examples in ancient books where " Peng" means the unit of goods, such as "Poems. Xiaoya. "Jingjingzhe": "Since I have seen a gentleman, I have a hundred friends." "Huainanzi. "Tao Ying": "So Sanyisheng is to seek the treasures of the world with thousands of dollars, to obtain the treasures, the multiplication of the chickens, the profound jade, the big shells, the black leopard, the yellow 罴, the green 犴, and the white tiger text. To dedicate to Zhou." " Peng" mostly means friends and like-minded people. Such as "Tsinghua One. "Cheng Mao" Jane 4: "Ke (He) respects (police) non-friends, Ke (He) refrains from non-commercials." It means to use friends as police and the Shang dynasty as a warning. Another example is "The Analects. "Xue Er": "Is it a pleasure to have friends from afar?" " Peng" also means being in a group or party. Such as "Shan Hai Jing. "Bei Shan Jing": "There are birds Yan, who live in groups and fly with friends, and their hair is like a female pheasant, and the name is 鵁." "Chu Ci. "Li Sao": "While living at the same time and good friends, the husband He Yan will not listen." " Peng" also means to share together. Such as "Hou Han Shu. "Li Du Biography": "Lee and Du are in the same position as friends." Li Xian's note: "Friends are the same."

朋字的基本解释

朋
péng
彼此友好的人：朋友。朋辈。朋侪。朋俦。宾朋。至爱亲朋。
结党：朋党（为私利而互相勾结、排斥异己的一帮人）。
成群：群居朋飞。
古代以贝壳为货币，五贝为一串，两串为一朋。
比：硬大无朋。
姓。
友

朋字的康熙字典解释
朋字的源字形
朋字的起名意思

：指彼此友好的人、结党、成群。

Friends
Basic explanation of words
Friends
péng
People who are friendly to each other: friends. Peers. Friends. Friends. Guests and friends. Beloved relatives and friends.
Party formation: crony (a group of people who collude with each other and exclude dissidents for self-interest).
In groups: living in groups and flying with friends.
In ancient times, shells were used as currency, five shells were one string, and two strings were one friend.
Ratio: Hard and no friends.
name.
Friend
Friends

Friends

Friends
Source glyph
Friends
Name meaning
: Refers to people who are friendly to each other, form a party, and form a group.
péng
I сущ.
1) друг, приятель, товарищ; близкий по духу, единомышленник
有朋自远方来, 不亦悦乎? разве не приятно, когда из далёких стран приезжает друг?
良朋 хороший друг
2) чета, пара, ровня
无朋 не знать ровни, не иметь себе равного
3) содружество; группа, сообщество; клика, камарилья; толпой, стаей; сообща, вкупе
群居而朋飞 стаей сидят и кучно взлетают
结朋 связаться в сообщество, образовать содружество
4) * пэн (древняя мера: а) пара или пяток раковин, черепаховых щитов, монет; б) две чаши вина; в) единица счёта дворов в деревне — 3 линя 邻 по 8 дворов в каждом, т.е. 24 двора)
II гл.
* составлять компанию (содружество); образовать клику (сообщество)
同产相朋 содружество единоутробных; сородичи всегда понимают друг друга
III собств.
Пэн (фамилия)

月 (месяц)
